title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, October 17, 2021
description: Today is the birthday of Shinichi Suzuki (1898). He taught children to play violin by listening and imitating, the way they learn to speak. A method that now bears his name,  Suzuki Violin Method.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Shinichi Suzuki (1898). He taught children to play violin by listening and imitating, the way they learn to speak. A method that now bears his name,  Suzuki Violin Method.
